reviewText: Sent me the wrong advanced horsemanship dvd. Instead of what was pictured (red box dvd collection) I received something completely different and only had 4 discs.

This is an excellent DVD.  I found that the only thing I wanted to have more, was the DVD playing while I was in the field with my horse.  I have watched it many times and really like it.  I find that it reminds me to do things that I may have been less diligent on doing.  It is a good addition to any horse person's library.
